pkgmetadata.longdescription: Score Projection Between in 'Vivo' and in 'Vitro' Datasets // Assigns a score projection from 0 to 1 between a given in 'vivo' stage and each single cluster from an in 'vitro' dataset. The score is assigned based on the the fraction of specific markers of the in 'vivo' stage that are conserved in the in 'vitro' clusters https://github.com/ScialdoneLab.
